short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SocialHire Chrome Extension for Linkedin, Angellist, Facebook

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SocialHire plug is used to build candidate pipeline from popular sites like linkedin, Angellist and Facebook. With a click of a button you can enter the data with candidate information from any webbased application into SocialHire as well as attach it to a position that is being recruited for. The plugin also notifies if a particular candidate is already in the system
